technologies.name: Biotechnology (focused on molecules and cells)
technologies.evidence: Aglaia invests in oncology drug development companies. Aglaia has a proven ability to select and mature early-stage breakthrough inventions that have the potential to transform cancer treatment.

technologies.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data
technologies.evidence: The joint development of a fully dedicated, highly versatile and flexible web-based platform for impact measuring and reporting in the life sciences industry, called Life Sciences Impact Suite.
